## Web3sdkioSDK.fromNetwork() method

Create a new SDK instance for the specified network

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromNetwork(network: Network, storage?: Web3sdkioStorage): Web3sdkioSDK;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                        | Description                                                      |
| --------- | --------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| network   | [Network](./sdk.network.md) | The network to connect to                                        |
| storage   | Web3sdkioStorage             | <i>(Optional)</i> The storage provider to use or IPFS by default |

**Returns:**

[Web3sdkioSDK](./sdk.web3sdkiosdk.md)

an SDK instance
